3: Looks like the fortification of the periphery is complete. I thought I was going to have to come back later and do it.
Gee, way to trust us!
Yeah! I wanna protest, too!
Without the commandant and Karenina, wouldn't this have turned out like what I was worried about?
Um...
Regardless, we're out of time. Ask Karenina to announce our next construction project.
I quit.
Huh?
I said, 'I QUIT!'
Wait, why do you quit? Without you, we'll be back to having Lee on our hides all day, every day...
Yeah! Yeah! Keep helping us, Karenina!
Like I said, I don't wanna get all buddy-buddy with you!
Maybe tomorrow I'll get an order, then have to watch my weapons turn against you... I finally get why Bianca has it rough.
You don't wanna be with this kind of person. So...
It's no use thinking too far ahead. Since we are all Constructs, we can become Corrupted at any moment. So let's just keep each other at arm's length...

2: Come together now for there to be a future.

3: Huh?
Karenina, what the commandant means is that we need to form a close bond with each other, otherwise our future will be swallowed up by darkness.
I think... I want us to become true companions...
Lucia, Lee, Liv, Commander... Everyone from now on is far more compelling than I had imagined.
I wanted to join, but I found myself out of place...

2: You've been a part of us for quite some time.

3: Really? I didn't think...
Yeah! Yeah!
Yep!
It's already official.
Is that how it works?... I...
Commandant, I... I hope I can always come back here...
Is that okay?
